data.eml:eml: A review of Drilini (Coleoptera: Elateridae: Agrypninae) of the Northern Levant, with description of a new species from Syria and a key to Levantine species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kundrata, Robin, Kobieluszova, Lucie, Bocak, Ladislav (2014): A review of Drilini (Coleoptera: Elateridae: Agrypninae) of the Northern Levant, with description of a new species from Syria and a key to Levantine species. Zootaxa 3755 (5): 457-469, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3755.5.5
